abstract: Google is making a big push in the enterprise market, but a new report from Forrester Research suggests progress against Microsoft will be slow.
snippet: Google is making a big push in the enterprise market, but a new report from Forrester Research suggests progress against Microsoft will be slow.
lead_paragraph: Google‘s efforts to cater to corporate and government customers — the enterprise market — have long been seen as half-hearted. Google is a consumer company, after all, so the enterprise side of the business looked to be the poor relation.

headline.main: Google Apps: A Long Road Ahead
